attributes.title: Don’t delete TikTok
attributes.review: I first opened the app to see the fat Cheeto and immediately closed it, my sister was right there witnessing it and she went blind. We rushed her to the emergency room and all they could do was put an eye patch on her  don’t get this app, it’s very dangerous

attributes.title: Very well developed app
attributes.review: A wonderfully developed app with many great features!

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Amazing app! Check it out and see what it’s about!

attributes.title: Very not worth my time🤪🥴🙀✨😹
attributes.review: I am very disgusted at this app because as a mother of 35, I wouldn’t want my children to see the kind of content that’s on this app, and again, apple, I am so so so soo sad that you would let this app on you apple store😜💫🥺🤢💖

attributes.title: Down with Trump
attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to see what lies this moron is trying to get people to believe. I was not disappointed. Trump is a fake, a liar, a cheat and a president-wannabe. I hope he loses so badly this fall that he explodes from the anger. Take away tik-tok trump and we trash YOUR app. Touche.

attributes.title: Its not gamer
attributes.review: i wanted to get this app for our current president but the second i opened the app the local gang came to my house with bats and dragged me out of my house into a van to be sacrificed to there almighty rat lord im currently waiting in the lobby of life to be sent into a new match

attributes.title: HATE!!
attributes.review: I was riding my dinosaur when I came across this app and thought “why not?” Well little did I know this app was going to steal all of my pennies! Like what the heck man? I highly recommend you don’t get this app unless you want your pennies gone smh.

attributes.title: my oompa loompa had a seizure because of this app
attributes.review: hi i have a thicc bangin saucy oompa loompa and it wanted to try this app and the app looks SO UGLY that the oompa loompa's thicc juicy body started shaking and at first i thought she was twerking (bc shes a queen who does that) but NO the sheer ugliness had a seizure. this app needs to be removed from the app store!!!

attributes.title: no ♥️
attributes.review: this app is truly awful. so offensive in every possible way and needs to be taken off the app store for crude content. As my favorite vine would say: “DIS COS TANG”. anyways, pls take it down, it hurts my feelings and trump is taking down tiktok for the same exact reason.

attributes.title: I think i’ve lost brain cells
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to become 😤enlightened😤 but if anything my life had become progressively worse please take this app of the app store before it cause others the pain it has caused me.
